```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(SDMtune)
library(here)
library(raster)
library(sp)
library(sf)
```

```{r}
tile_names <- here("methods", "Penn_migration_model", "predict_output") %>%
  list.files()

tile_rasters <- map(tile_names, function(x){
  here("methods", "Penn_migration_model", "predict_output", x)%>%
    raster()
})

merged_rasters <- tile_rasters[[1]]

for(i in 2:length(tile_rasters)){
  merged_rasters <- raster::merge(merged_rasters, tile_rasters[[i]])
}

writeRaster(merged_rasters, here("methods", "Penn_migration_model", "rf_mig_5_15_24.tif"))
```
